name: Beyond the Sphere
description:
Roughly a year and a half after the last update for Space Station Continuum, four community members decided to make a remake of the game.

The game is a tycoon/sim about building space stations, with cartoony vector art. The first alpha release will feature the first two tech eras (1970-1990), a choice of sandbox or if you so choose, career mode with tech progression and time-based economy.
